mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, b. * from (select review_board_no, review_board_title, review_board_writer, review_board_oneline, review_board_content, review_board_thumbnail, review_board_date from review_board_tbl order by review_board_no desc)b) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select r.review_board_title, r.review_board_thumbnail, r.review_board_no, r.review_board_title, r.review_board_oneline, r.review_board_content, r.review_board_date, m.member_name, r.review_board_writer from review_board_tbl r left join member_tbl m on m.member_id = r.REVIEW_BOARD_WRITER where rownum < 7 order by r.review_board_no desc
